TopicTitle: So I was testing infinite fuel, and the small probe core...

Articles.Content:
With the KS-25x4, you can acheive Kerbol Escape within 20 minutes. Thats to leave the "SOI" of Kerbol. within 20 minutes of real time

Whoo! Speed!

You read that right, 400 thousand Meters per Second.

Dev Cheats are fun, especially when you have spare time
I can't wait to see the asparagused monsters which result from utilizing these engines!
